name: Kalina's Fate
description: The most dangerous spider predators destroyed the spider’s home and safety haven and as a result as being now homeless and in danger’s sight, the Queen’s children ran away in search of a temporarily safer place in order to hide and survive.  As the Queen emerges from some of her home’s wreckage, she assures that all of her enemies and predators will suffer at her hands, no matter the cost. But suddenly, as she wanders around her lost paradise, she notices that none of her children are around. In a panic, the Queen starts lifting some of the wreckage and damaged goods in search of them. After some time she thinks this is useless and that, being frail and fragile as babies, they probably fled and hid to avoid the predators. This is yet another reason for Queen Arachne to proceed with her revenge. She must now fulfill her role as a mother, and above all, protector of her own species and set an example for her children.
